extendedInfo.description: â» If you use old version (under v.1.1.1) of Familybook, download and install new version FamilyBook (over v.1.1.2) and uninstall the old version.âââ A service for your family â familybook âââfamilybook is a service that enables you to create and share warm memories and moments from everyday life with your family. You can become closer to your family through familybook, a mobile space for just your family.- Main Features-* NewsNews is an open space for yourself and your family.Photos and updates are shared in real-time, and you can also see your posts separately on your personal page.* Family PageCreate family pages based on your motherâs side, fatherâs side, or in-laws, and invite family members to each page. Family Calendars, Photo Albums and Family Trees are in each Family Page. Use each menu to share schedules and strengthen family relationships.* Family TreeCreate your family tree centered on yourself and your parents.Instantly call, message or send mobile presents from your family tree. * CalendarShare your schedules with Family Calendar.Birthdays are shown automatically if your birthday is entered in your profile. Push alarms are sent to your family on your birthday. Lunar birthdays are automatically calculated.Schedules entered into the calendar are shared with family members, and push alarms can be set.* Family Picture All family members can create photo albums to upload and share photos. Share special memories like family trips, birthdays, and weddings with your family.* Minimum RequirementsAndroid versions 2.2 â 2.3.X and 4.0.X or higherScreen resolution 240 x 320 or higherLanguages available: English, KoreanâQuestions or comments? Contact us at familybook@hansigan.com âOfficial blog: http://blog.naver.com/familybook_m

reviews.title: Doesn\'t send verification code
reviews.comment: The app requests for mobile no. to send verification code but never sends any. I have tried several resends & 3 different phone nos, uninstalling
reviews.author: Lara R
